inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: contrast CT scan of acute perforated appendicitis

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: signed by the patient or his/her parents

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: initial presentation of a phlegmon (abscess in evolution)

exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, nausea and vomiting, febrile with tenderness, rebound tenderness and guarding on palpation. CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis.
